description: This trap is generated whenever the Timing Control Module
either manually or by the system due to failure detection.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD Fore-TIMING-MIB::tcmTimingSourceChange Fore-TIMING-MIB::tcmIndex i 9999 Fore-TIMING-MIB::tcmCurrentTimingRef i 1 Fore-TIMING-MIB::tcmRefSource i 1 Fore-TrapLog-MIB::trapLogIndex i 9999

description: This is the index for this Timing Control Module (TCM)
variables.name: Fore-TIMING-MIB::tcmIndex

description: This is the current timing reference in use for this
variables.name: Fore-TIMING-MIB::tcmCurrentTimingRef

description: This is the timing reference source index for the
variables.name: Fore-TIMING-MIB::tcmRefSource

description: The sequence number of this trap occurence. This
entry uniquely identifies an entry in the trapLogTable
variables.name: Fore-TrapLog-MIB::trapLogIndex

description: This trap is generated whenever the Timing Control Module
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD Fore-TIMING-MIB::tcmTimingSourceFailed Fore-TIMING-MIB::tcmIndex i 9999 Fore-TIMING-MIB::tcmCurrentTimingRef i 1 Fore-TIMING-MIB::tcmRefSource i 1 Fore-TrapLog-MIB::trapLogIndex i 9999

description: This is the index for this Timing Control Module (TCM)
variables.name: Fore-TIMING-MIB::tcmIndex

description: This is the current timing reference in use for this
variables.name: Fore-TIMING-MIB::tcmCurrentTimingRef

description: This is the timing reference source index for the
variables.name: Fore-TIMING-MIB::tcmRefSource

description: The sequence number of this trap occurence. This
entry uniquely identifies an entry in the trapLogTable
variables.name: Fore-TrapLog-MIB::trapLogIndex
